messages.message: Hey just getting around to this, this is really helpful feedback thanks @Brian! We currently don’t have any additional work scoped out but @jtau maybe we can discuss this for next quarter

Looking at aihub-uat in sandbox console it does look like the environment has failed to complete an upgrade since Friday which explains why the banner has stuck around for so long. We’re able to manually turn off the banner when this happens, which I’ve just done. It might take a few minutes for it to go away

> It would be nice to have the banner pop up dynamically while working in Build projects so there’s less confusion/timely awareness of what’s going on that might be contributing to a potentially dissatisfactory experience.
We could expose a new endpoint that returns the status & long poll it every 10 mins but this could be expensive if it’s running all the time for all users
